title: Old player looking for new friends (LFP)
body:
Hi! I'm Teddy Mercury and I'm trying to come back to League after a big break of playing and it would be suuuper cool to have a friendo nintendo that could guide me back in the game without any rage?
I sometimes try playing but I can't seem to stick without some cool friends to hang out with!

Umm~ I'm a little tryhardish, very silly and I have a penchant for sneaking Wu-Tang lyrics into casual conversation!
I used to play Jungle and Top but I think I've been out of the game so long that it wouldn't really matter what I play, just as long as I play!

I can use Skype or Vent or TeamSpeak (is it still even around?) for mouth sounds which would be super good to help edge me back in.

So, anyone wanna play with a weird, tattooed, wu-tang rappin', tryhardin' young lady?

replies.body: Hey, I've just recently gotten back into the game myself after a longish hiatus, add me in-game as "Vapid" if you want.

Ay man, I'm looking to start a ranked team once iv got enough players, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. If ya don't mind playing with a less experienced player but a quick learner, then hit us up if you're keen to join. IGN: CastielZaim11
